articles.title: Apple could begin development on A19 Bionic chip for future iPhone, suggests report | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Apple is reportedly working on the A19 Bionic SoC, the first on a 2nm process, and the M5 chip for Macs, potentially impacting future iPhone and Mac releases. These details are unofficial and await official confirmation.
